title: Sharp Creative Typeface - Desperate To Find It Can Anyone Help? :(
content:
Hi Guys, I’m desperately trying to find out where to get hold of this typeface. I found this on flickr and have emailed the person who posted it but still have not managed to get any response. I have seen it on a few posters also but I just can’t seem to locate it anywhere. Any help would be very much appreciated,

Thanks  
Paul

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [img1978344.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836/http:/typophile.com/files/img1978344.jpg) | 26.64 KB |

 [‹ Lifes a beach](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43804 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pubic Hair Font ??? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43563 "Go to next forum topic")
author: quarterback

comments.content: Typeface? Looks like a logo. Which letter is this supposed to be?

I found this recently as well on FFFFOUND which I am sure is the same typeface, but the link was broken and so it didn’t send me anywhere...

[http://i27.tinypic.com/30mv6ma.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836/http:/i27.tinypic.com/30mv6ma.png "http://i27.tinypic.com/30mv6ma.png")

Sorry I don’t know how to embed these images here,

Thanks  
Paul

<cite>Sorry I don’t know how to embed these images here,</cite>  
Use the “Insert Image” link below where you input your next comment.

As of right now, I can’t make a solid guess based on your first image. And I can’t open the link in your second post. Sorry.

For those who can’t open the link:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_5196.jpg)

That looks familiar now...

[http://www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836/http:/www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout1.html "http://www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout1.html") - regular

[http://www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211836/http:/www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout2.html "http://www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout2.html") - sharp

Or if you’re adverse to PayPal...
